metadata.Title: CVE-2022-25896 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - medium.
metadata.Description:
This affects the package passport before 0.6.0. When a user logs in or logs out, the session is regenerated instead of being closed.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-25896` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

node-passport - 0.6.0+~1.0.0-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: passportjs package in lunar, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.6.0+~1.0.0-1').
